N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-7.5 - Permit content and terms of issuance

State Regulations

The permit content and terms of issuance a reset forth
generally in Subpart 231-11 o f this Part. In addition, the following emission
limitations, as applicable, shall be established in a permit: (a) the potential to emit of each regulated
NSR contaminant with emissions greater than the applicable significant project
threshold from the proposed facility; (b) the potential to emit of a modification
at an existing non-major facility which has a project emission potential for
any regulated NSR contaminant that exceeds the significant project threshold
for that contaminant; and
(c) any
BACT limitations. Notes
